Articles.Content: I noticed that if you had a 3x3 square of structural panels, And using whack a kerbal as a example shot out the center panel, Any panels it is attacked to would fall off as well, Even if they were clipping into the others, I really think when parts are clipping each other a attachment node should be made between then therefore structures dont just fall apart when one tiny root part is destroyed because they would have the other parts supporting them.
